## Toolbox.updateCursorDeleteStyle\_() method

Adds or removes the CSS style of the cursor over the toolbox based whether the block or bubble over it is expected to be deleted if dropped (using the internal this.wouldDelete\_ property).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
protected updateCursorDeleteStyle_(addStyle: boolean): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  addStyle | boolean | Whether the style should be added or removed. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
